text: aur jo log un (kuphphaar makke) se pahale ho guzare hain un logon ne bhee paigambaron kee mukhaalaphat mein badee badee tadabeere kee to (khaak na ho saka kyonki) sab tadabeere to khuda hee ke haath mein hain jo shakhsh jo kuchh karata hai vah use khoob jaanata hai aur anaqareeb kuphphaar ko bhee maaloom ho jaega ki aakhirat kee khoobee kis ke lie hai
